basic.description:
A study of Québec society through the analysis of cinema focusing on the impact of recent cultural institutions on the formation of cultural identity during and since the Quiet Revolution. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 396/3.0.
LEARNING HOURS    126 (36L;6O;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Cinéma et société au Québec

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN396 (formerly FREN295; FREN496.
